DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of Brincidofovir (BCV) when administered as an initial 200mg dose followed by 100mg twice weekly (BIW) for a total of 5 doses.
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label, Multicenter Study of the Safety and Anti Viral Activity of Brincidofovir (BCV, CMX001) for Ebola Virus Disease
DOC.criteria: Positive for Ebola virus RNA in plasma Subject must be able to ingest, absorb, and tolerate oral medication Subject must be willing to use adequate contraception during their participation
